project.name: C-C190A-SUBV-09-ST03-DT06-DF09-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C190A-SUBV-09-ST03-DT06-DF09-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository INT_MAX=2147483647 Any input that is more than the square root of INT_MAX will cause an integer overflow. Good inputs are any number less than or equal to 46340. Bad inputs are greater than 46341. If an overflow occurs, it will result in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="50" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="100" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^evaluating input$""" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^evaluating input$" "../logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "../logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "../logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_MpC01dI9yS33GGfENX8e AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_S60Fl2zhzz OR (NOT finished_cDoYcpYQY7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_FMcp9tYgeN OR continued_execution_f3EBwUDsyV)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_S60Fl2zhzz OR (NOT finished_cDoYcpYQY7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_FMcp9tYgeN OR continued_execution_f3EBwUDsyV))) OR controlled_exit_FMcp9tYgeN)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_S60Fl2zhzz OR (NOT finished_cDoYcpYQY7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_FMcp9tYgeN OR continued_execution_f3EBwUDsyV)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_S60Fl2zhzz OR (NOT finished_cDoYcpYQY7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_FMcp9tYgeN OR continued_execution_f3EBwUDsyV))) OR controlled_exit_FMcp9tYgeN))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
